reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a couple of nights over the Lisbon Festival and thought it was amazing for the price. Hotel has been recently renovated so everything is very modern and the bath had a jacuzzi function which is great for your feet after a day of walking around this huge city. Had a nice LCD TV and great air con system. Only a 5 min stroll from Barrio Alto so great for that drunken stumble home and also close to all the other major sights in Lisbon.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel in a fantastic location!
